entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Resource sattelite assemblies are not generated when using dotnet cli #25632
  • dotnet workload install fails to recognize new workload manifest #25629

Closed

  • Docker buildx with linux/arm64 fails in AzureDevOps since 6.0.300 update #25452
  • [API Compat] Add rule to make sure that enum underlying type matches #23902
    7.0.1xx
  • [API Compat] add rule to make sure enum values match #23903
    7.0.1xx
  • What is the intended way to target a specific version of the .NET Runtime? #25220
  • "warning NETSDK1179" shows up even though `--self-contained` is specified along with `--runtime` with .NET 7.3-preview.4 #25644

PullRequests

Created

  • Implement new flag for ignoreing apphosts in dotnet run #25647
    Area-CLI
  • [release/6.0.3xx] Update pre-release label to servicing #25641
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #25626
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • add rules to make sure enums match #25542
    Area-Compatibility
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1788494 #25599
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Define 'DeploymentResponse' to parse Zip Deploy status response #25600
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Preview 6 branding #25621
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #25619
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Try out pre-downloading the test packages on the helix machines #25055
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Replace hardcoded error string in source with string from resources #25372
    localization, area-Meta
